sentences.cn: 渐渐老去的摇滚乐歌手

sentences.en: Claire spent the morning in a wicker rocker on the screened porch with a book.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔整个早上都在装着纱窗的走廊里坐在柳条摇椅上看书。

sentences.en: DIP. Touch. Leaves. Rocker. Fretting switch series and so on. Socket.
sentences.cn: 拨动. 轻触. 叶片. 翘板. 微动等开关系列. 插座.

sentences.en: Harry Truman loved to sit in an old rocker in the evenings.
sentences.cn: 晚上,哈里·杜鲁门喜欢坐在一张旧摇椅上.

sentences.en: His landlady appeared to be slightly off her rocker.
sentences.cn: 看来他的女房东有点疯疯癫癫.

sentences.en: I just went off my rocker.
Let's play on the seesaw junglegym rocker swing merry - go - around slide.
sentences.cn: 我们一起玩跷跷板攀登梯摇床秋千 转椅 滑梯 吧.

sentences.en: One of the heads with rocker arm brackets and spark plugs installed.
sentences.cn: 其中一名负责人与摇臂括号和火花塞安装.

sentences.en: Push rocker rotate to make the disc filldown the dropping material.
sentences.cn: 手动或执行机构推动摇杆使扇形闸板沿轴心旋转开启,物料随即下落.

sentences.en: Rocker - style tail plate: simple structure, light weight, load small, easy to install.
sentences.cn: 摇臂式尾板: 结构简单, 自重较轻, 载重量较小, 安装简便.

sentences.en: Sarah sat in her squeaky willow rocker, and looked out the window.
sentences.cn: 她坐在吱吱作响的柳条摇椅上, 朝窗外望着.

sentences.en: She seated herself in a porch rocker and stared blindly into the sun.
sentences.cn: 她在一张摇椅上坐下,茫然向阳光里望着.

sentences.en: Some castings, such as crankshaft, rocker arm et al were produced.
sentences.cn: 已浇注了曲轴 、 摇臂等铸件.

sentences.en: Then she went back to the rocker to think.
sentences.cn: 然后她走到摇椅边,坐下来思索.

sentences.en: This paper has used analytics to design Plane crank - rocker mechanism.
sentences.cn: 采用几何解析法设计平面曲柄摇杆机构.

sentences.en: When I went back after cleaning my hands, Mother was sitting in her rocker.
sentences.cn: 我洗手回来时, 母亲坐在摇椅上.

words.tran_cn: 岩石的，多岩石的；坚如岩石的；摇晃的；头晕目眩的

trans.tran_cn: 摇杆，摇轴，摇椅，摇木马，摇滚乐歌曲，摇滚歌手，弯底冰鞋
